8.post_text:
Hello everyone, my name is Terence and I am a BMW Genius.
 
Have a question regarding our wide range of BMW models? Wondering if you should purchase your BMW now or later? Or curious to find out more about the key features and technologies in our BMW models?
 
Join me in this live Facebook Q&A session happening right now till 5pm on 9 Dec 2017 and I will be answering all of your questions. 

Share your question in the comments below and you could be one of the 15 lucky winners to walk away with an exclusive BMW tumbler! #AskABMWGenius

comments.message: Thank you all for your questions! We will be announcing the winners on 14 Dec (Thurs), so stay tuned. We will be having fun-filled Christmas activities at our showroom at 303 Alexandra Road next weekend as well as the following weekend, so do drop by if you can :) ~Terence

Hi Genius, 

BMWs have common oil leak problems caused my 2 commonly thought issues:

1. Hot engine increasing rate of wear;
2. Material of rubber seals.

Can you let us know how the current models are different?

1. What’s the average temperature of a regular BMW now compared to old models/old batch of models (exclude M Series)

2. Are the rubber seals of different material now? If yes, what material is used compared to before?

If you can answer these questions on point, you’ll get more customers from today.

Looking forward.
To prolong battery life span, it that that true or advisable always disable the i-stop function before each drive?
Hi Genius! How does the automatic frontal collision prevention technology works? How about the accuracy?
Hi, there is an unpleasant smell from the air con every time I start up my engine and switch on the air con. Why is this so and is it having some problems?
Hi,my sliding roof cover on my 6 series got stuck and can only close halfway.Any clue how can this be happen?
May i know how the Fuel consumption and CO2 emissions in the BMW 7 series coupe? I will like to know how much will this range of series cost? #AskABMWGenius
How much is the 740i n 740li n what the difference

After having driven my F10 535i for 2years, I learnt that the recommended Castrol engine oil is not able to take the heat. After switching to better Ester based oil I find a whole lot of issues solved. What's your take on this please?
Terence. Tell me more about the little square located at the front bumper of the 6GT? Differences compared to the 5GT? Why one should upgrade (or not).
Hi Genius, with the diesel model will there be any issue driving across the causeway? Do station across Malaysia support the diesel fuel generally?
I like the sport mode of G30. However, every time I turn on the engine, it is in comfort mode (by default). Anyway to make it permanently in sport mode?
To prevent the common oil leak problems, is it recommended to service the engine oil for every 7k instead of 10k? By the way, I'm driving a BMW F30.

Hi Terence 
On highway will the hybrid plugin activited?
Is 225xe good for 50% highway 50% city?
How is the fuel consumption compared to the Diesel version
Interesting in bmw connective drive to be used in 5series 2011. Possible to upgrade the software?

Hi Terence
I noticed that the recent BMW models have the lights connected to the kidney grills.
Is there a design reason for it? 

On a side note the G30 5 series is gorgeous :)
Hi. How is the servicing for I3 like ? Normal BMW is around 15km ...
What is actual avg fuel consumption for X3 in Singapore driving condition?
Any idea when BMW SG is bringing in the BMW 225xe 7 seater ?
Hi can i ask if the bmws in spore will come with Amazon Alexa voice Ai?
What is the recommend petrol grade for the bmw 1.5 cc 3 cylinder engine ？
Hi, what are the advantages of a iperformance plug-in hybrid compared to a conventional bimmer?
I use to see my dad top-up 200+ ml of engine oil on his 1.6 3 series Bmw every 7000km. Is this normal?
Hi Terence. How much for series 4? How much the down payment?
Thank you
